title: Tech Mahindra to Generate New Revenue Streams and 1000 Jobs in UK by Leveraging AI and Data Science - Analytics Insight
content: Tech Mahindra to Generate New Revenue Streams and 1000 Jobs in UK by Leveraging AI and Data Science  Analytics Insight
description: Tech Mahindra, a leading provider of digital transformation and now its generating new revenue streams and jobs by leveraging AI and data science. Its Makers Lab will bolster NXT of AI growth.
